headline: FordDirect Partners with Podium to Deliver AI-Powered Conversations to Ford and Lincoln Retailers
summary: Podium, a leader in AI-powered customer engagement tools, today announced its AI BDC solution is now officially in program with FordDirect, making Podium's industry-leading AI Employee—known to many dealers as Jerry—available to Ford dealers and Lincoln retailers nationwide with exclusive pricing.

headline: Ford Motor (F) Unveils Revolutionary Universal EV Platform And Production System
summary: Ford Motor (F) recently announced a groundbreaking initiative: the introduction of its Ford Universal EV Platform and Production System, poised to reshape the electric vehicle landscape by promising affordable, high-quality options. This innovation comes amid a 5% increase in Ford's share price over the last quarter, reflecting the market's positive reception despite challenges revealed in its recent earnings report depicting a net loss in Q2 2025. The broader market sentiment also leaned...

Pence Points To Ford’s $800 Million Tariff Bill In a recent post on X, Pence said, “American Companies and American Consumers Pay the Cost of American Tariffs. headline: Ford recalls over 103,000 US vehicles over damaged axle bolts, NHTSA says
summary: A broken axle bolt can damage axle hub splines - components that transfer power from the axle to the wheels and help them rotate.  Damaged splines can cause vehicles to roll away when in park without the parking brake engaged or result in a loss of drive power, increasing the risk of a crash, the U.S. auto safety authority said.

raw.headline: Ford recalls over 103,000 US vehicles over damaged axle bolts, NHTSA says
raw.summary: A broken axle bolt can damage axle hub splines - components that transfer power from the axle to the wheels and help them rotate.  Damaged splines can cause vehicles to roll away when in park without the parking brake engaged or result in a loss of drive power, increasing the risk of a crash, the U.S. auto safety authority said.
